summary: In the North Sea in 1944, passengers of a downed Royal Air Force transport aircraft talk about their lives while awaiting rescue in their dinghy.
cast: Michael Redgrave|Dirk Bogarde|Anthony Steel|Nigel Patrick|Bonar Colleano|James Kenney|Sydney Tafler|Griffith Jones|Jack Watling|Guy Middleton|Ian Whittaker|Paul Carpenter|George Rose|Glyn Houston|Victor Maddern|Eddie Byrne|Jack Taylor|Michael Balfour|Anton Diffring|Gudrun Ure|Rachel Kempson|Joan Sims|Jack Lambert|Moultrie Kelsall|Nigel Green|Michael Ripper|Graham Stark
title: The Sea Shall Not Have Them
